resources.string: Keep track of who you owe money to and who owes you.
Create a list of friends and family to track your give-and-take.
View your total lend/borrow amounts at a glance.
Keep everyone updated without annoying notifications.
Add details for the recipient to track your transactions. You can also provide optional contact information.
Add or update transaction details to manage your finances effectively. You can include optional notes for better clarity.
Add an initial balance if there's an outstanding amount.
